author: swhitenstall
title: Catalyst-Coordinator Hub
description: Proposers funded by Catalyst lack a collaborative layer to answer FAQ questions, leave feedback and raise issues.
solution: Implement a collaborative layer, a community hub, to welcome funded proposers to Catalyst and provide support.
experience: Stephen Whitenstall. QA-DAO. Circle V2 representative for funded proposers. Funded proposer in F6: Improve and Grow Auditability.
